title: `then` without `if` is ignored
description: `then` has effect only when paired with `if`. Without `if` it can be removed.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: then present without if
comprehensiveExamples.description: `then` alone has no effect; remove it or add a matching `if`.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: Valid conditional with if/then
comprehensiveExamples.description: A `then` branch is valid when paired with `if`.

message: Remove `then` because there is no matching `if`.
